result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

10:06 AM 2021CF000142, 2021TR001074, 2022CF000096, 2021CF000111 - Defendant Jordan L Buroker in court.  Attorney Michael C. Curran in court for Jordan L Buroker.  Attorney Amy Elizabeth Forehand in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Curran states that they had a final pretrial and they do expect that this hearing will be resolved. Attorney Forehand concurs. Any substantive motion need to be filed by the end of next week.
Status conference on October 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.

21CF111, 21CF142, 21TR1074 called together for final pretrial. Def also has 22CF96 (new matter). 11:26 AM Defendant Jordan L Buroker in court.  Attorney Michael C. Curran in court for Jordan L Buroker.  Attorney Amy Elizabeth Forehand in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty. Curran notes the Defense has received offer from the State to resolve all open matters; needs more time to review; asks that all matters be continued to Oct. 7 when the Def next has status in 22CF96. No objection from the State. Court orders all matters be reset to 10/7 for status; trial in the oldest case 21CF111 reset - JS 12/12; FT stacked 12/13 and 12/14. FPT 11/30 at 10. All matters 10/7 at 10 a.m. for status.
To Those Posting Cash Bond

ADDRESS INFO for Jordan L Buroker
Current: 303 Bluff St, Cazenovia, WI 53924 United States  (Effective: 08-24-2022)
Prior: 952 N. Main St. Apt. 1, Richland Center, WI 53581

11:38 AM 2022CF00096, 2021CF000111, 2021CF000142, 2021TR001074 - Defendant Jordan L Buroker appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Amy Elizabeth Forehand in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael C. Curran in court for Jordan L Buroker. Attorney Curran has provided the court with the waiver of the preliminary hearing form and notes that that he would like to speak about bond in the newest case (22CF96). Court speaks to JB about waiving the preliminary hearing. JB agrees with waives the preliminary hearing on 22CF96.  Court binds over for trial. 

Information has been filed  by Attorney Forehand. Attorney Curran waives the formal reading and stands mute. Court states the max penalties.

Attorney Curran speaks about bail in 22CF96 and asks for a reduction to $2,000 instead of $7,500. Court speaks about the motion that  was filed. Attorney Curran comments. Attorney Forehand speaks and objects to the bond modification. Court speaks about the amount of cases the defendant had and states that there is a victim. 

Court reduces bail to $3,000 cash with the same conditions.

No contact directly or indirectly with the victim (JK). No contact by phone, third party or electronic devices . No contact with the victims residence, work or any place temporary occupied by her. No contact under ss. 940.47.
